title: Fox’s Neil Cavuto Reports on the Passing of Colleague Brenda Buttner With Moving Tribute
text:
Fox’s Neil Cavuto Reports on the Passing of Colleague Brenda Buttner With Moving Tribute by Josh Feldman | 5:42   
Brenda Buttner , host of Fox News’ Bulls & Bears , has passed away at 55. Her longtime colleague Neil Cavuto reported on the tragic news this afternoon with a moving, emotional tribute to his friend and colleague. 
Buttner had been battling cancer for a while and had received lots of well-wishes from fans on Twitter . 
“Let it be known,” Cavuto said, “that Brenda Buttner made us want to watch a business show with heart.” 
He shared a a reel of highlights from Buttner’s long TV career––mostly fun and lighthearted moments––before saying this in closing: 
“When is the last time––the last time you laughed at a business show? I don’t know. Business journalism is never gonna be the same. I just don’t know, now that she’s gone, whether we’ll ever be. Brenda Buttner. Gone way too soon at 55.” 
Eric Bolling , one of the many people featured in Cavuto’s tribute reel, tweeted about the sad news as well: Sad news to report… our colleague and my friend Brenda Buttner passed today. She fought cancer heroically. RIP Brenda. We will miss you. 
— Eric Bolling (@ericbolling) February 20, 2017
